description:
MemcachedDriver get_all method calls the is_up for every record which requests for a single key, instead of using a more efficient  get_multi
https://github.com/linsomniac/python-memcached/blob/master/memcache.py#L1049 which is able to retrieve multiple records with a single query.
title: get_multi not used for get_all in mc serviegroup driver

comments.content:
MemcachedDriver get_all method calls the is_up for every record which requests for a single key, instead of using a more efficient  get_multi
https://github.com/linsomniac/python-memcached/blob/master/memcache.py#L1049 which is able to retrieve multiple records with a single query.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~afazekas

comments.content: It looks like get_all is not used right now. Do you know of any cases where this is currently used?
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~jogo

comments.content:
get_all is used only in the zk driver , called by the is_up  (does not seams efficient).

The db driver gets the service list without calling get_all from the service group driver, it just using the is_up for comparing the date.

For zk and mc driver using the get_all call instead of the is_up could be better for service listing (nova service-list) and scheduling.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~afazekas

comments.content: But if nothing is using get_all outside zk.  Fixing the original bug "get_multi not used for get_all in mc serviegroup driver" doesn't really make sense.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~jogo
